settings.heading: Support Our Music Community Affected by the LA Wildfires
Together, we can help rebuild lives and amplify hope.

settings.text:
The devastating wildfires in Los Angeles have left a lasting impact on our community, including countless musicians who’ve lost their homes, instruments, and cherished creative spaces.

At Vic Firth, we believe in the power of music to heal, inspire, and bring people together, especially during challenging times. That’s why we’re sharing the MusiCares LA Fire Relief Fund link to help provide vital support to musicians and their families impacted by this tragedy.

Your donation can make a meaningful difference—helping with immediate needs like housing, essential supplies, and instrument replacement, so these artists can begin to rebuild and create again. Let’s stand together for our musical community. Every contribution, no matter the size, brings hope and recovery one step closer.
